steps.name: Given I am login on staging env by created timestamp project
Debug step:
When I navigate to menu "Database" with submenu "Database Editor"
Then I should see Database screen display
When I delete all tables in Database menu
When I delete the table with Name "jit010"
When I add new table with Name "jit010" and Comment "Testing"
Then I should see the table with Name "jit010" display
When I add new column with Name "jitcol010" Type "file" for Table name "jit010"
When I check radio button popup Name "Single file"
When I check radio button popup Name "CSV"
Then I should NOT see textbox popup Name "Max for each file size,Min files,Max files" displayed
When I update popup with textbox Name "Max file size" to value "100"
When I press Add column button popup
When I open popup to see column infos Name "jitcol010" of table with Name "jit010"
Then I should see textbox popup Name "Max file size" has value "100"
When I update popup with textbox Name "Max file size" to value "-1"
When I press Save button modal popup without wait
Then I should see error box display with message "file size can not be less than 0 MB"
When I update popup with textbox Name "Max file size" to value "100"
When I check radio button popup Name "Multiple files"
Then I should NOT see textbox popup Name "Max file size" displayed
When I press Save button modal popup
When I open popup to see column infos Name "jitcol010" of table with Name "jit010"
Then I should see textbox popup Name "Max for each file size" has value "100"
Then I should see textbox popup Name "Min files" has value "empty"
Then I should see textbox popup Name "Max files" has value "empty"
When I update popup with textbox Name "Max for each file size" to value "-1"
When I press Save button modal popup without wait
Then I should see error box display with message "file size can not be less than 0 MB"
When I update popup with textbox Name "Max for each file size" to value "50"
When I press Save button modal popup
When I open popup to see column infos Name "jitcol010" of table with Name "jit010"
Then I should see textbox popup Name "Max for each file size" has value "50"
When I update popup with textbox Name "Min files" to value "2"
When I press Save button modal popup without wait
Then I should see error box display with message "min files can not be more than max files"
When I update popup with textbox Name "Min files" to value "empty"
When I update popup with textbox Name "Max files" to value "2"
When I press Save button modal popup without wait
Then I should see error box display with message "min files required"
When I check radio button popup Name "Single file"
When I check radio button popup Name "Image (PNG, JPG, JPEG, GIF, HEIC, HEIF)"
When I press Save button modal popup
When I open popup to see column infos Name "jitcol010" of table with Name "jit010"
Then I should see radio button popup Name "Single file~Image (PNG, JPG, JPEG, GIF, HEIC, HEIF)" is checked
